name: helcitybiker
description: An app to visualize Helsinki City Bikes usage"

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.dev:populate: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev:populate" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd server && npm run test" "cd client && npm run test"

author: jugipe
